Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot
Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control

Class BarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.PlotSpaceController
      • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.BarController
  • public class BarController
extends PlotSpaceController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Bar Plot. Stores Bar Data items and displays them in the given plot space.
    Author:
    Tóth Bálint
    See Also:
    BarData

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.PlotSpaceController

        PlotSpaceController.LegendLocation, PlotSpaceController.RefLine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BarController()
      Default constructs a PlotSpaceController and inits the bar data storage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BarController

        public BarController()
        Default constructs a PlotSpaceController and inits the bar data storage.

    • Method Detail

      • resetDataLineNumbers

        public static void resetDataLineNumbers()
        Resets the line numbering for the plot. The counter operated by this function indexes the default palette for the line colors.

      • addCategories

        public void addCategories​(double[] xs)
        Sets the numbering of groups.
        Parameters:
        xs - array of group identifiers.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth​(double w)
        Sets the width percentage of the bars. Each bar has a precalculated width available to it based on the number of groups and data items inside the groups.
        Parameters:
        w - value between 0.0 and 1.0 describing the width percentage of the bars.

      • setStyle

        public void setStyle​(BarStyle s)
        Sets the bar plot's style.
        Parameters:
        s - style (group, stack)

      • addData

        public void addData​(BarData d)
        Adds a bar data item to the list.
        Parameters:
        d - bar data.

      • setXTick

        public void setXTick​(double[] tick)
        Function is invalidated, the bar's x values can't be changed.
        Overrides:
        setXTick in class PlotSpaceController
        Parameters:
        tick - ignored.

      • setXLim

        public void setXLim​(double min,
                    double max)
        Function is invalidated, the bar's x values can't be changed.
        Overrides:
        setXLim in class PlotSpaceController
        Parameters:
        min - ignored.
        max - ignored.

      • setYTick

        public void setYTick​(double[] tick)
        Sets the Y tick points in absolute space.
        Overrides:
        setYTick in class PlotSpaceController
        Parameters:
        tick - tick points for the Y axis.

      • display

        public void display()
        Operates the graphics functions in the frame to produce a bar plot.
        Specified by:
        display in class PlotSpaceController
